description: Application for Minor Material Amendment (S73) to vary of conditions 2 and 3 (Approved Plans) of planning permission ref: PP/2015/6742 dated 12/07/2016 for "Porch to front elevation, single storey rear extension, first floor side extension above existing garage and conversion of garage to habitable space, first floor rear extension and alterations to fenestration on the front elevation at ground floor level." The variation seeks to alter the ground floor rear extension; alter the fenestrations at the existing gound floor garage incorporating access to the side elevation; amendment to the fenestration to the ground floor porch and cloak room; removal of window to the side elevation; installation of a sidelight to the front door set; increase in size of cloaks window to the front door; replacement of timber cladding with brick wall on the side elevation; alteration to first floor dormer.
